instructions.title: Installation Instructions
instructions.importance_text: CRON is responsible for automatically sending emails from the queue, processing schedules, and maintenance operations. Without proper CRON configuration, scheduled messages will not be sent.
instructions.docker_text: In a Docker environment, the scheduler is started automatically when the containers are active.
instructions.linux_text: Add an entry to crontab with the command {command}:
instructions.linux_warning: Replace {path} with the actual path to your application directory.
instructions.automation_text: You can run CRON from external automation tools via {bold}. Simply call the endpoint every minute.
instructions.forge_text: Laravel Forge: The scheduler is automatically configured for every Laravel application. Simply enable the "Schedule" option in the server panel.
instructions.vapor_text: Laravel Vapor: The scheduler is built into the serverless environment and works automatically.
instructions.n8n_note: Use the {node} node with a {trigger} trigger every minute.
instructions.make_note: Use the {module} module with scheduling set to every minute.

webhook.title: Webhook Configuration
webhook.no_token: Generate an API token to use the webhook.

verification.title: How to verify?
verification.step1: After proper configuration, the red warning bar will disappear automatically
verification.step2: In the "Statistics" tab, run data will appear
verification.step3: In the "History" tab, you will see execution logs
verification.step4: On the Dashboard, a widget with the CRON status will appear

marketplace.title: Marketplace

welcome.documentation_desc: Laravel has wonderful documentation covering every aspect of the framework. Whether you are a newcomer or have prior experience with Laravel, we recommend reading our documentation from beginning to end.
welcome.laracasts_desc: Laracasts offers thousands of video tutorials on Laravel, PHP, and JavaScript development. Check them out, see for yourself, and massively level up your development skills in the process.
welcome.news_desc: Laravel News is a community driven portal and newsletter aggregating all of the latest and most important news in the Laravel ecosystem, including new package releases and tutorials.
welcome.ecosystem_desc: Laravel robust library of first-party tools and libraries, such as Forge, Vapor, Nova, Envoyer, and Herd help you take your projects to the next level.
